name: Chart
shortDescription: Chart provides a set of frequently used chart types, and customization options.
description: ### Create the following chart with shape painter:
Dataset is a structure which contain 3 arrays.
[name] array and [value] array is a must for all types of charts.
[color] array is not necessary for radar chart and line chart.
**ShapePainter is set to NOT "clear the rendered image between each frame" to reduce lag.
So not suggest to redraw every frame.*
**Text object for label is linked to ShapePainter. "Take into account" when delete both object.*

eventsFunctions.name: DrawBarChartHorizontal
eventsFunctions.sentence: Draw bar chart horizontal with _PARAM2_ based on_PARAM1_ (label: _PARAM3_ center: _PARAM4_, _PARAM5_ at layer: _PARAM6_, grid width: _PARAM7_, grid max value:_PARAM8_, grid segment:_PARAM9_, bars gap: _PARAM10_,  bar height: _PARAM11_,  grid line color: _PARAM12_,   grid line opacity: _PARAM13_, grid line width: _PARAM14_, data line color: _PARAM15_, color override: _PARAM16_, data line opacity: _PARAM17_, data line width: _PARAM18_, data fill color: _PARAM19_, data fill opacity: _PARAM20_,  label font size: _PARAM21_, label font color: _PARAM22_, label font opacity: _PARAM23_, value at top: _PARAM24_

events.comment:
copy the whole dataset to internal varaible
"__BarChartHorizontalSideNumber" count the number of dataset name
"__BarChartHorizontalNextBarY" is the addup  of bar width and gap each loop, means no complex calculation.
the shape object move to specific layer

clear the chart last render image
set clear as no, so no need to redraw every frame
clear all linked labels text object
change bar color
if overrider is true, chnge line color to "BarChartHorizontalGridLineColor
draw bar

create label and reposition
update "__BarChartHorizontalNextBarY"
create value label at top of the bar
main axis (x and y)

parameters.longDescription: A dataset with a "name" array (string), a "value" array (number)  and a "color" array (string)
parameters.name: BarChartHorizontalDataset

parameters.description: Shape object that draw the chart
parameters.name: BarChartHorizontalShapeObject

parameters.description: Chart bottom left corner x offset(0 for no change)
parameters.name: BarChartHorizontalX

parameters.description: Chart bottom left corner y offset(0 for no change)
parameters.name: BarChartHorizontalY

parameters.description: Number of segment for x axis (min: 1)
parameters.name: BarChartHorizontalGridSegment

parameters.description: Bar border color replace by grid line color
parameters.name: BarChartHorizontalOverride

eventsFunctions.name: DrawRadarChart
eventsFunctions.sentence: Draw radar chart with _PARAM2_ based on_PARAM1_ (label: _PARAM3_ center: _PARAM4_, _PARAM5_ at layer: _PARAM6_ radius: _PARAM7_, grid max value:_PARAM8_, grid segment:_PARAM9_, grid line color: _PARAM10_,  grid line opacity: _PARAM11_, grid line width: _PARAM12_ grid fill color: _PARAM13_ grid fill opacity: _PARAM14_ data line color: _PARAM15_, data line opacity: _PARAM16_, data line width: _PARAM17_, data fill color: _PARAM18_, data fill opacity: _PARAM19_, data point radius: _PARAM20_, label font size: _PARAM21_, label font color: _PARAM22_, label font opacity: _PARAM23_, label include value: _PARAM24_

events.comment:
copy the whole dataset to internal varaible
"__RadarChartSideNumber" count the number of dataset name
the shape object move to specific layer

clear the chart last render image
set clear as no, so no need to redraw every frame
clear all linked labels text object
Draw grid outter shape, with fill color
Draw grid inner shape, grid line only, fill nothing
Draw grid axis line
draw the polygon based on value
draw data point

create label text
and link them to the chart shape object
add value at the end if true

update the label position
base on width of the text, concer position of the grid, and some extra spacing (radius * 1.1)
